Protocol.Name: SLC SDF Inter App Calls
Protocol.Description: SLC SDF Inter App Calls is an example showing how to communicate between automationscript and element.

Information.Subtext: Indicates how much the device is delaying its response in this simulation.
The content of the command for creating a Lineup.
This just triggers a Sleeping QAction to fake device communication in this example.
Indicates if debug logging should be written.
